attributes.action: make banks automatically pay back penalty and overdraft charges rather than making people claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As overdraft charges have been shown to be unfair in the high court banks etc should be made to pay back the monies they have charged automatically rather than people having to go through the current claim system and getting clogged down by the red tape involved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
